__TOC__


Ubuntu on Air! is an online show which can be found at <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntuonair.com|www.ubuntuonair.com]]</nowiki>.  It consists on live streams (Google+ Hangouts On Air) on different topics. This can be used for different events, such as for a mid-release session, which will consist on a Q&A with different guests, or for Development Hangouts, which ocurr frequently. You can check the archive of all past sessions at <nowiki>[[http://www.youtube.com/UbuntuOnAir|www.youtube.com/UbuntuOnAir]]</nowiki>.

=== Upcoming Events ===

You can check the upcoming events and sessions at <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntuonair.com/calendar|the calendar]]</nowiki>. If you have a suggestion for future sessions, or want to propose a guest, make sure to let us know by sending an email to <nowiki>[[mailto:onair@ubuntu.com|onair@ubuntu.com]]</nowiki>, or by pinging jose on irc.freenode.net.
